answers.answer: Nope, they send me straight upstairs to Labor & dilivery, And they are not much help..

The only really concerning thing is the swelling. You need to demand they do testing or moniter you. They can't just turn you away if you demand monitoring. You sound like you have an awful hospital if this is how they treat people
They can not deny to see you. Go as a walk in.
I had similar symptoms with preeclampsia

Thanks ladies, if this keeps up for like a while, im calling the ambulance so they can take me to the other hospital thats farther, Since im kinda afriad to drive alone and i might get in lots of pain and crash  or something. And my hubby is working 4 hrs away today. And his gramma, well she dont know how to drive.

question: okay, so my next appointment is on weds, and they wont see me because they are always busy..MY SYMPTOMS1.Sharp pain when i walk inside my vagainnaa.2.dizzy out of the nowhere3.rapid swellingness feet and hands.4.Out of air out of the nowhere.5.Plus i have ,Gestational dietbetes, PTSD,Anemic, 38+6.. help ladies,ohhh, and i almost forgot. title: Can someone help?
